item.description: Best Friends in Rocky Hill is hosting a meet-up group for all dogs to kick off SUMMER! We are so excited that the warm weather is headed our way and the birds are chirping, it's time to celebrate. Let our furry friends romp and roll around in a social environment. If your friendly dog likes to meet new friends, then come on over to our play session. We provide toys, water, and clean up at our indoor playroom. Refreshments for dogs and humans too! Please provide current vaccines for your pet because they will be interacting with other dogs.

group.name: The Rocky Hill "All Breed" Meetup Group

item.name: All Dog Meet-up
